View Purchased Pet View¶

tracktivityPetsWebsite.views.view_purchased_pet.view_purchased_pet(request, pet_index='')[source]¶

The view_purchased_pet method finds the purchased pet that corresponds with the pet_index parameter. The details for the purchased pet are then returned back to the users browser in JSON format.
